==== Create a new Category Page ====
* Go to [[Categories.WebHome]] and click "Create" * Choose the PCategory Template * Make up a name for the category * Click "Create" * You should now be looking at your new page. Dont worry that it doesnt look right yet.
==== Add Objects to your page ====
* You are now going to add a single PCategoryClass object to your page: * Under the Edit menu, choose "Objects".
===== Add a "PCategory Class" object =====
* In the "new object:" field, choose "PCategory Class" and click "Add". * Now fill in the fields with information about the category: ** name: the same as the title ** description: generally, categories are so broad (e.g. "Lie") that they don't need much description. * Press "Save". Open this page in another tab to view it, so you don't have to keep going in and out of "edit mode". Every time you press "Save", go to the other tab and refresh the page. * At this point, verify that the full page looks correct.
